org.apache.river.test.share

Class GroupsUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.share.GroupsUtil

  • public class GroupsUtil
extends Object
    This class contains a set of static methods that provide general-purpose functions for processing group sets; functions such as displaying the contents of one or more group sets, comparing the contents of two group sets, etc.
    See Also:
    DiscoveryGroupManagement, QAConfig

    • Method Detail

      • displayGroupSet

        public static void displayGroupSet(String[] groups,
                                   String groupSetName,
                                   Level level)
        Displays the contents of the input array which contains the names of a set of groups.
        Parameters:
        groups - String array containing the names of the groups to be displayed
        groupSetName - identifying String that will be displayed along with the contents of the array. This parameter can contain any value, even null, but will typically be set to the name of the array whose contents will be displayed. If null is input, the default String "groups" will be used
        level - the logging level.

      • displayGroupSet

        public static void displayGroupSet(String[] groups,
                                   Level level)
        Displays the contents of the input array which contains the names of a set of groups.

      • compareGroupSets

        public static boolean compareGroupSets(String[] groupSet1,
                                       String[] groupSet2,
                                       Level level)
        Compares two sets of group names ignoring duplicate names. If debugging is turned on (qautil.debug=true), this method uses an instance of org.apache.river.qa.harness.QATestUtil to display information about the two sets being compared. This method should be invoked by tests that need to compare two sets of groups for equivalent content in which duplicate names are unimportant.
        Parameters:
        groupSet1 - String array containing the first set of group names to compare
        groupSet2 - String array containing the second set of group names to compare
        level - the logging level
        Returns:
        true if the sets are equivalent

      • getGroupsWithDups

        public static String[] getGroupsWithDups(String[] groups)
        Constructs a set of groups that contains elements which duplicate other elements in the set, as well as one or more of the groups contained in the groups parameter. This method is useful for constructing a set of groups with which to attempt group addition, replacement, and removal, in which the existence of duplicate elements is important.
        Parameters:
        groups - a String array in which the set of group names returned by this method will contain one or more of the elements of this set
        Returns:
        a String array in which at least one element duplicates other element(s) in the set, and at least one element duplicates at least one of the group names contained in the groups parameter.

      • getSubset

        public static String[] getSubset(String[] groups)
        Constructs a set of groups that is a sub-set of the groups parameter. This method is useful for constructing a set of groups with which to attempt group manipulation (in particular removal), in which a sub-set of a particular set of groups is important.
        Parameters:
        groups - a String array in which the set of group names returned by this method will be a sub-set of groups parameter
        Returns:
        a String array which is a sub-set of the set of group names referenced by the groups parameter.

      • getMemberGroups

        public static String[] getMemberGroups(QAConfig config,
                                       int index)
        Given an index value, retrieves the set of member groups with which a lookup service corresponding to that index has been (or will be) started. If the index value is zero and no member group configuration item with that index exists in the resource configuration file, then this method will attempt to retrieve the member groups item with no index.
        Parameters:
        config - instance of QAConfig class through which the member groups will be retrieved
        index - the index value of the particular configuration item to retrieve
        Returns:
        String array containing the names or the groups to which the lookup service corresponding to the value of the index parameter belongs

      • getMemberGroups

        public static String[] getMemberGroups(QAConfig config)
        Retrieves the set of member groups with which a lookup service corresponding to the 'membergroups' configuration item having no index has been (or will be) started. If there is no such configuration item, this method attempts the retrieval using an index value of zero.
        Parameters:
        config - instance of the QAConfig class through which the member groups will be retrieved
        Returns:
        String array containing the names or the groups to which the lookup service belonging to the indicated member groups belongs

      • getMemberGroupsStr

        public static String getMemberGroupsStr(QAConfig config,
                                        int index)
        Given an index value, retrieves the configuration string that identifies the set of member groups with which a lookup service corresponding to that index has been (or will be) started. If the index value is zero and no member group configuration item with that index exists in the resource configuration file, then this method will attempt to retrieve the member groups item with no index.
        Parameters:
        config - instance of the QAConfig class through which the member groups will be retrieved
        index - the index value of the particular configuration item to retrieve
        Returns:
        comma-separaged String containing the names of the groups in which the lookup service corresponding - to the value of the index parameter - is a member

      • getMemberGroupsStr

        public static String getMemberGroupsStr(QAConfig config)
        Retrieves the configuration string - having no index - that identifies the set of member groups with which the corresponding lookup service has been (or will be) started. If there is no such configuration item, this method attempts the retrieval using an index value of zero.
        Parameters:
        config - instance of the QAConfig class through which the member groups will be retrieved
        Returns:
        comma-separaged String containing the names of the groups in which the appropriate lookup service is a member

      • toCommaSeparatedStr

        public static String toCommaSeparatedStr(String[] strs)
        Converts a String array to a comma-separated String in which each token corresponds to an element of the input array.
        Parameters:
        strs - the String array to convert
        Returns:
        comma-separaged String in which each token corresponds to an element of the input String array
